name: 7 Days
description:
Rusty Lake style puzzle game. 

Controls: 

 - click on an object to zoom in, click the down arrow to go back

 - to use inventory items, select the item and click where you want to use it

The first download button downloads the game as an app, you will need to give it permission to run on your PC (it's totally safe!)

The second will download as folders. In order to play, extract all files and click on the "7 Days.exe"

YouTube Walkthrough  

(Please don't click please don't please don't pleaseeee)

Bilibili 解谜攻略 https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1L54y1W7ym 

锈湖风格解谜游戏

操作：

 - 点击一个物品来放大，点击底部返回键取消放大

 - 使用工具栏内物品：选择物品，然后点击你认为可以使用的地方

两个下载链接下载的游戏是一样的，第一个下载的是压缩的应用格式，第二个是压缩的文件夹格式。
